tasks.label: Kill Ports and Node
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5000,9229 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { if ($_.OwningProcess) { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
